DataElement.preferredName: Local Erythema/Redness Injectable Product-Related Reaction Occurrence Measurement Centimeter Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric centimeter value to represent the measurement of the local erythema/redness associated to the reaction to the injectable product.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Local Erythema/Redness Injectable Product-Related Reaction Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality._Red discoloration of the skin caused by infectious agents, inflammation, drug hypersensitivity, or underlying disease._A reaction to the injection of a pharmacological or biological substance._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:Red discoloration of the skin caused by infectious agents, inflammation, drug hypersensitivity, or underlying disease.:A reaction to the injection of a pharmacological or biological substance.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.
Red discoloration of the skin caused by infectious agents, inflammation, drug hypersensitivity, or underlying disease.
A reaction to the injection of a pharmacological or biological substance.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Approved and released. 2021-4-23 ak; Created for NCI-INC0574290 - Reactogenicity Grading Scale Tables 000115. 2021-4-22 ak

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.:A centimeter is a basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Approved and released. 2021-4-23 ak Created for NCI-INC0574290 - Reactogenicity Grading Scale Tables 000115. 2021-4-22 ak
